#summary Tire Service (Project Overview)

= Introduction =

Tire Service IS for managing orders (customer side) an stock of tires (employee side).


= Details =

== Capabilities of the system: ==
  * Customer side
    * Order new tires
    * Include additional services to the order
    * Create multiple orders
  * System side
    * offers different types, sizes, brands and prices
    * records customer's order account, type of the car and date of executing of service
  * Employee side
    * List all orders according to the customer, price of the order
    * Manage the list of tire types
